tha-ap307:1.3_0: That’s what I want to hermit,
tha-ap307:2.3_0: I have all fruits in the past,
tha-ap307:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap307:3.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
tha-ap307:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap307:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Dhaniya.
tha-ap307:6.1_0: a senior mendicant who goes with fruits of the senior.
